snippet.title: Youtubers Life - Get social! Launchdate 18 May 2016
snippet.description:
The life of a youtuber is multidimensional. It’s not just about recording, editing and publishing videos. Watch this trailer to discover what vloggers do in their daily life when they are not in front of a computer.

Hang out with friends, go clubbing, attend videogame festivals, play with classic consoles… Can anything be better than that? Of course it can! Don’t forget the magical four-letter word: L-O-V-E. Love is the engine that makes the wheel of mankind move. Experience what this means to you and get married with your other half. If you haven’t had enough fun yet, build up your relationships with other youtubers. If you become a good friend of theirs, they will eventually invite you to parties at their yachts.

There are one hundred surprises more in this game to be discovered. Be the first one to unveil them all! Early access on Steam will be available on 18 May 2016. Don’t miss it!


https://www.facebook.com/youtuberslifegame
https://twitter.com/youtubers_uplay
http://www.youtuberslife.com/
http://www.uplayonline.com/
